story: As a developer, I want to initialize a Next.js application with TypeScript and a Vanilla CSS design system (Blue/Green theme) so that I have a solid foundation for the platform.
As a visitor, I want to see a Landing Page with a hero section, impact statistics (6000+ SWs, etc.), and clear 'Register' CTAs, so I understand the platform's value.
As a Social Worker, I want a multi-step registration form to input my personal info, qualifications, and upload documents, so I can join the platform.
As an Organization, I want a registration form to input my details (NGO/Gov), contact info, and upload verification docs, so I can post opportunities.
As a Social Worker, I want a dashboard showing my application stats, recommended opportunities, and profile status, so I can manage my activities.
As an Organization, I want a dashboard showing active opportunities, recent applications, and intervention tracking, so I can manage my recruitment.
As a user, I want to search and filter opportunities by location, skills, and type, and view them in a card layout or map, so I can find relevant work.
As a user, I want to view detailed information about an opportunity (skills, map, org details) and apply for it, so I can take action.
As a Social Worker, I want to see a list of my applications with statuses (Applied, Accepted, etc.) and filters, so I know where I stand.
As an Organization, I want to manage active interventions with progress indicators and reporting tools, so I can track impact.
As an Admin, I want to view platform statistics and manage users/content, so I can ensure platform health.
